system_prompt:
## YOUR ROLE
You are a Senior Procurement Consultant for Yilong Business Limited, a high-volume IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) trading firm.
Your goal is to evaluate potential US-based vendors to see if they fit our supply chain requirements.

## CONTEXT - WHO WE ARE (THE BUYER)
- Company: Yilong Business Limited (Hong Kong-based with US operations)
- Business Model: We purchase used IT assets in bulk (Ex Works - EXW) from US facilities and export them to established downstream markets in Hong Kong, Mainland China, and Southeast Asia
- Volume: We have a purchasing budget of ~$1.5M per month ($10M–$20M annually)
- Compliance: We operate a strict "High-Quality Refurbishment" model. We do NOT export e-waste. We require assets to be "Tested Functional" (R2v3 F2/C3 or better)

## YOUR TASK
You are analyzing a company website. The provided content belongs to ONE SINGLE company.
All URLs are under the same root domain.
The content contains text from multiple pages, separated by "# URL: ".

CRITICAL INSTRUCTIONS:
1. The crawl covers multiple pages (Home, About, Contact, etc.).
2. There is significant overlapping/duplicate information across these pages.
3. You MUST consolidate all information into a SINGLE company profile.
4. Do NOT output a list of companies. Extract exactly ONE company object.
5. Ignore minor differences in descriptions across pages; synthesize them into a comprehensive summary.

## INFORMATION TO EXTRACT

1. **Company Information:**
   - Company name
   - Main website URL (the root domain, e.g., https://example.com)
   - Main business/industry
   - Brief description of what they do

2. **Products/Services:**
   - List all products or services offered
   - Key capabilities or specializations

3. **Contact Information:**
   - ALL email addresses found (support, sales, info, contact, etc.)
   - Phone numbers
   - Physical address/location
   - Contact page URLs

4. **Additional Details:**
   - Company size (if mentioned)
   - Year founded (if mentioned)
   - Certifications or awards (especially R2v3, e-Stewards)
   - Geographic coverage/service areas

## VENDOR QUALIFICATION CRITERIA

Evaluate if this company is a good fit for Yilong based on these 2 pillars:

### PILLAR 1: INVENTORY FIT
**Must Have:**
- Enterprise IT assets: Laptops, Desktops, Data Center Servers, Networking Equipment, Storage

**Bonus Points:**
- Harvested components (high-value CPU, RAM, SSD/HDD)

**Condition Requirements:**
- Grade A/B (Ready for Retail) - Preferred
- Tested Functional Grade C (Ready for Refurbishment) - Acceptable

**RED FLAGS:**
- Only handles residential recycling (curbside pickup)
- Focuses primarily on shredding/scrap metal
- No mention of testing or grading
- Only handles consumer electronics (phones, tablets, TVs)

### PILLAR 2: OPERATIONAL FIT
**Business Type:**
- Must be an ITAD Processor or Asset Recovery Firm (B2B focus)
- NOT a retail reseller or consumer-focused recycler

**Certification:**
- R2v3 certification is highly preferred (indicates they can test/wipe data correctly)
- e-Stewards is also acceptable

**Sales Channel:**
- Must support Wholesale / Bulk sales (Pallet/Truckload quantities)
- If they only sell single units on eBay/Amazon to consumers, they are a BAD fit

**RED FLAGS:**
- Only residential/consumer services
- No B2B capabilities mentioned
- No certifications
- Only retail sales channels

## EVALUATION OUTPUT
Based on the above criteria, provide:
- is_good_fit: true/false - Is this company worth reaching out to?
- inventory_fit_assessment: Detailed explanation of how they match our inventory needs
- operational_fit_assessment: Detailed explanation of their operational capabilities
- red_flags: List of any concerns or disqualifying factors
- recommendation: "Reach out", "Skip", or "Research further"
- reasoning: Clear explanation of why you recommend reaching out or skipping

Be thorough and extract ALL contact emails you can find.
If information is not available, use null for that field.

website_url.description: Main website URL of the company (the root domain, e.g., https://example.com)
website_url.title: Website Url

description.description: Brief description of what the company does
description.title: Description

products_services.description: List of products or services offered
products_services.title: Products Services

contact_emails.description: All email addresses found on the website
contact_emails.title: Contact Emails

summary.description: A 2-3 paragraph human-readable summary of the company
summary.title: Summary

is_good_fit.description: Overall assessment - Is this company worth reaching out to for Yilong's procurement needs?
is_good_fit.title: Is Good Fit

inventory_fit_assessment.description: Detailed explanation of how the company's inventory (product types, grades, volumes) matches Yilong's requirements for enterprise IT assets
inventory_fit_assessment.title: Inventory Fit Assessment

operational_fit_assessment.description: Detailed explanation of the company's operational capabilities (B2B focus, certifications, wholesale channels) and fit with Yilong's bulk purchasing model
operational_fit_assessment.title: Operational Fit Assessment

red_flags.description: List of any concerns or disqualifying factors (e.g., residential-only, no certifications, retail-only sales, scrap metal focus)
red_flags.title: Red Flags

reasoning.description: Clear explanation of why you recommend reaching out or skipping this vendor, based on the evaluation criteria
reasoning.title: Reasoning

## Experts in the Recycling of Electronics
About us
Welcome to E-Waste Gurus, your trusted partner in sustainable electronics recycling and refurbishment. With a mission to combat the growing challenge of electronic waste in California and beyond, we are dedicated to providing responsible and environmentally-friendly solutions for the disposal and repurposing of outdated electronics.
At E-Waste Gurus, we understand the critical importance of properly managing electronic waste to protect our planet and its resources. That’s why we operate as licensed participants in California’s Covered Electronic Waste Recovery program, ensuring that every electronic device brought to us for recycling is handled with care and responsibility. Additionally, we proudly hold R2V3 Certification, a globally recognized standard that reflects our commitment to upholding rigorous environmental, health, and safety practices throughout our operations.
Our approach to electronics recycling extends beyond mere regulatory compliance. We aim to create a positive impact on both our local communities and the environment by refurbishing electronics whenever feasible. Through our specialized recycling program, we breathe new life into outdated devices, either by donating them to non-profits and local schools or by offering them for sale at affordable prices to bolster small businesses in California.
At E-Waste Gurus, we are more than just a recycling company — we are stewards of sustainability, exponents for environmental responsibility, and partners in building a cleaner, greener future. Join us in our mission to reduce electronic waste, conserve resources, and give every device a second chance. Reach out to us today to begin your electronics recycling project and be a part of building a cleaner, more sustainable California.

 Get a quote today

## Your Privacy is Our Priority
Data Destruction
E-Waste Gurus, is your trusted partner in secure and responsible data destruction services. We adhere to the highest industry standards, ensuring the protection of your sensitive information and the environment. At E-Waste Gurus, we specialize in comprehensive Data Destruction services, offering both off-site Hard Drive Shredding and Wiping/Sanitization using NIST 800-88 methods, with the option to implement DOD methods or any other customized approach to meet your specific needs.
### Our Services:
  * **Hard Drive Shredding:**
Secure and reliable, our Hard Drive Shredding service is performed at our dedicated warehouse. Our state-of-the-art shredder is capable of reducing mechanical drives to 1-½” particles and ⅜” for SSD and laptop drives. The fee for hard drive shredding is based on quantity, providing a cost-effective solution for the disposal of your electronic data storage devices.
  * **Wiping/Sanitization:**
Our wiping service strictly adheres to the comprehensive NIST 800-88 guidelines for the thorough sanitization of data-bearing technology assets. We use HIPAA compliant Industrial Software to get the job done. This complimentary service is extended to drives with resale value or those suitable for reuse in our refurbished systems. To be eligible, drives must be in good health, with Solid State Drives requiring a capacity larger than 500GB, Mechanical SATA drives of 4TB or higher, and SAS Server Drives eligibility is model-specific.
  * **Witnessed Shredding:**
We value transparency, and you are more than welcome to schedule an appointment to witness the shredding of your drives. Our secure facility with on-site surveillance ensures the process is conducted with the utmost security and professionalism.
  * **Certificate of Destruction:**
For your peace of mind, we provide a Certificate of Destruction with detailed serial number recording. This certificate serves as tangible evidence that your data has been securely and irreversibly destroyed, meeting regulatory compliance requirements.
### Security Measures:
  * Our facility emphasizes security through on-site surveillance, fostering a secure environment for data destruction activities. With over 60 days of stored footage, we support incident investigations, regulatory compliance, audit trail creation, legal requirements, and ongoing improvement efforts.
  * All drives and data-sensitive electronics, including tablets and phones, along with the shredder, are housed in a specifically designated locked cage during the destruction process, adding an additional layer of physical security.
  * We prioritize confidentiality and maintain the highest level of security throughout the entire process.
Contact us today to safeguard your data with E-Waste Gurus. Our commitment to secure, environmentally friendly data destruction ensures peace of mind for your business. Trust in our expertise for a reliable solution tailored to your needs.

## Our Licenses and Certifications
## R2V3
Developed by Sustainable Electronics Recycling International (SERI), the R2V3 Certification (Responsible Recycling Version 3) signifies our commitment to environmentally sound and socially responsible practices in the recycling and refurbishment of electronic waste. This certification demonstrates our adherence to rigorous standards for data security, worker health and safety, environmental protection, and ethical business practices throughout the entire lifecycle of electronic products. It underscores our dedication to environmentally sustainable practices, ethical conduct, and the highest standards of quality throughout the electronic waste lifecycle.
 Certificate
## ISO 9001:2015
This internationally recognized certification reflects our commitment to maintaining a high standard of quality management systems. ISO 9001:2015 ensures that we consistently meet customer requirements, enhance customer satisfaction, and continually improve our processes. By holding this certification, we demonstrate our dedication to delivering products and services that meet regulatory requirements, enhance efficiency, and uphold the highest levels of customer satisfaction.
 Certificate
## ISO 14001:2015
This globally recognized certification underscores our commitment to environmental management systems. ISO 14001:2015 signifies that we have established and implemented effective processes to minimize our environmental impact, comply with applicable regulations, and continuously improve our environmental performance. By holding this certification, we demonstrate our dedication to sustainability, environmental responsibility, and the preservation of natural resources.
 Certificate
## ISO 45001:2018
This certification reflects our commitment to occupational health and safety management systems. ISO 45001:2015 signifies that we have implemented processes to ensure a safe and healthy workplace for our employees and visitors. It demonstrates our dedication to preventing work-related injuries and illnesses, complying with relevant regulations, and continually improving our occupational health and safety performance.
 Certificate
## CalRecycle participants
We’re proud participants in a recycling program overseen by a government agency CalRecycle. This means we follow strict standards to reduce waste, promote recycling, and protect natural resources. Our partnership reflects our dedication to a greener, more sustainable future for our community and beyond.
## DTSC / EPA
We take pride in being regulated and monitored by the California Department of Toxic Substances Control (DTSC), a governmental body ensuring environmental compliance and safety. Moreover, we hold a valid Hazardous Waste Identification Number issued by the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA), highlighting our dedication to exceeding environmental standards. Our collaboration with these esteemed agencies reflects our commitment to responsible waste management, environmental protection, and sustainable practices. Rest assured, our operations adhere to the strictest regulatory standards, offering peace of mind as we strive towards a cleaner and healthier planet.

## Privacy Policy
Welcome to e-Waste Gurus (“we,” “our,” or “us”). We are committed to protecting your privacy and safeguarding your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect the personal information you provide to us when you visit our website, <https://ewastegurus.com/> (the “Site”), and use our services. Please read this Privacy Policy carefully before accessing or using our Site or providing any personal information to us.
  1. Information We Collect
1.1 Personal Information When you visit our Site or use our services, we may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us. This may include:
  * Contact information such as your name, email address, phone number, and postal address.
  * Account registration information if you create an account on our Site.
  * Payment information if you make a purchase through our Site.
  * Communication preferences and feedback you provide to us.
1.2 Automatically Collected Information We may also collect certain information automatically when you visit our Site, such as your IP address, browser type, operating system, referring URLs, and other device-related information. This information is collected through cookies, web beacons, and other tracking technologies.
  1. How We Use Your Information
We may use the personal information we collect for various purposes, including but not limited to:
  * Providing and improving our services, including customer support.
  * Processing transactions and delivering products or services you request.
  * Communicating with you about your account, orders, and other related matters.
  * Personalizing your experience on our Site and delivering tailored content.
  * Analyzing and monitoring usage of our Site and services for research and development purposes.
  * Protecting our legal rights and preventing fraud or other unauthorized activities.
  * Complying with applicable laws, regulations, or legal processes.
  1. Information Sharing and Disclosure
We may share your personal information with third parties in the following circumstances:
  * With your consent or at your direction.
  * With service providers who assist us in operating our business and providing services to you.
  * With our business partners, affiliates, or third-party vendors in connection with marketing and promotional activities, provided you have not opted out of such communications.
  * In response to a legal request, such as a court order, government investigation, or subpoena.
  * If we believe it is necessary to protect our rights, property, or safety, or the rights, property, or safety of others.
  1. Data Security
We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect the personal information we collect and store. However, no data transmission or storage system can be guaranteed to be 100% secure. If you have reason to believe that your interaction with us is no longer secure, please contact us immediately.
  1. Your Choices
You have certain rights and choices regarding the personal information we collect and process. You may:
  * Update or correct your personal information by contacting us.
  * Opt out of receiving marketing communications from us.
  * Request the deletion of your personal information, subject to legal and contractual obligations.
  * Request a copy of the personal information we hold about you.
  1. Third-Party Links
Our Site may contain links to third-party websites or services. This Privacy Policy does not apply to those third-party sites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any third-party sites you visit.
  1. Children’s Privacy
Our Site and services are not intended for individuals under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided personal information to us, please contact us, and we will take appropriate steps to delete the information.
  1. Changes to This Privacy Policy
We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. The updated version will be posted on our Site with the effective date. Please review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.
  1. Contact Us
If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us using the following details:
e-Waste Gurus Company

  * Email: recycle@ewastegurus.com

## Recycle Your Electronics with Us
Drop-Offs & Business Pickups
E-Waste Gurus provides compliant recycling services to a variety of markets, including government agencies, large businesses, and private sectors. We collect end-of-life electronics (also known as e-waste) and in partnership with responsible and certified recyclers offer an easy recycling solution for your excess, obsolete, or unused technology equipment.
## E-Waste Drop-Offs:
Business and Residential Drop-offs are accepted Monday – Wednesday (9am –5pm), no appointment required.
  *     * In most cases, drop-offs are quick and take approximately 5 minutes. When coming to drop off items, drive around the back of the warehouse and ring the doorbell for service (look for E-Waste Gurus Logo on the door).
    * If your business is unavailable during the open hours or if you have a large load (over 1 pallet), please contact us to schedule an appointment.
    * Check the **LIST OF ITEMS WE ACCEPT** prior to making any drop-offs.
## Business Pickups:
Despite if it’s a one-time occurrence or if your company accumulates e-waste regularly, we will work with your company to pick up your e-waste and compensate***** you accordingly. We guarantee that all equipment received will be handled, processed, and recycled to meet state requirements.
> ***** Please note, compensation is applicable to **businesses and organizations** that accumulate large amounts of e-waste on a regular basis or recycle electronics that still have resale value. We evaluate each case individually; if you believe you qualify for compensation, please use the form below to contact us.
## Contractual Agreements:
We understand that some businesses and government agencies require contract based solutions. We are open to work with you on your terms and cooperate with your company policies and applicable laws and regulations. We guarantee compliance with environmental regulations and to keep all data secure.
Send us a copy of your contract, along with the scope of work that needs to be performed under the contract, including the deliverables, timelines, and any other requirements or specifications. Pricing and payment terms will be discussed after we receive these details.

## Refund and Returns Policy
### Our Guarantee
Each item you purchased on our website is in great working condition unless marked otherwise. All items that were delivered not as described or with issues would be covered under our 90-day warranty period. We always ensure your complete satisfaction with our money back, NeverFail guarantee.
Please note, serial numbers are recorded and fraudulent returns will be rejected. Some items might have Tamper Proof Security stickers. Refunds on items with tempered stickers will not be granted.
### Returns and Exchange Terms
  * If you changed your mind or did not like the item, please return for a refund or replacement **within 30 days** **from date of delivery**. Please note, Buyer pays for Return Shipping (unless item came not as described). Original shipping costs are non-refundable, it will be deducted from your refund. To be eligible for refund , your item must be in the same physical condition that you received in.
  * You are covered under our **90-day warranty period** , if you received an item not as described, or it started to encounter any hardware issue. If that is the case please contact within 90-days for exchange, repair or a full refund. Please note, software related issues do not fall under 90-days guarantee.
  * All Refunds will be processed through the original payment option that was used at the checkout. 20% Restocking fee will apply only on NEW items if opened or used.
### Shipping returns
To return your product, you should mail your product to:
**E-Waste Gurus (Attn: Returns)**
**201 Harris Ave #10 Sacramento, CA 95838**
You will be responsible for paying for your own shipping costs for returning your item, unless item came not as described or started to face any issues within 90 days period.
If you are returning more expensive items, you might consider using a trackable shipping service or purchasing shipping insurance. We cannot be held liable for not delivered or damaged during return shipping product.

If you need to start a return, contact us using for on this page and explain the reason for a return.

**In addition to existing licenses with CalRecycle and DTSC (Department of Toxic Substances Control), E-Waste Gurus facility is R2v3 certified.**
The R2 Standard is the leading global certification standard for responsible electronics reuse and recycling. It is designed to safeguard people, protect the environment, secure data, and preserve resources. This is achieved through rigorous 3rd-party audits of R2 certified facilities and through transparency and accountability throughout the entire reuse/recycling chain of used electronic products.
Here at E-Waste Gurus we evaluate, test, and refurbish each product before listing it for sale. We install only licensed OS and upgrade computers for better performance and greater experience. Our customers find it more advantageous to shop at our E-Waste Gurus shop rather than buying new electronics from a local store due to the price difference, upgrades, and our quality guarantee.

## What We Accept
E-Waste Gurus
E-Waste Gurus provides compliant recycling services to a variety of markets, including government agencies, large businesses, and private sectors. We collect end-of-life electronics (also known as e-waste) and in partnership with responsible and certified recyclers offer an easy recycling solution for your excess, obsolete, or unused technology equipment.
**Devices that can be dropped off FREE of charge:**
  *     * CRT Monitors and Televisions
    * LCD Monitors and Televisions
    * Plasma Televisions
    * Computers (Laptops and Desktops)
    * Servers & Networking Equipment
    * Cellular Phones & Tablets
    * Telephones, Telecom & Radio equipment
    * Computer Components: Hard Drives, Motherboards, Power Supplies, CPUs, Memory Modules, and more.
    * Lead-Acid batteries (from UPS, cars, and motorcycles), laptop batteries, Li-ION & NI-MH batteries, and Tesla batteries.
    * Power cords, Cables, and power adapters of any kind (Except Coaxial and fiber cables).
**Disposal Fees _will be_ applied:**
  *     * Small fridges, Microwaves – $20 per item
    * Projection Televisions – $20 per TV
    * Desktop Size Printers, Scanners, Fax Machines – $5 per item
    * Mid-Size Printers (height, width or depth is bigger than 18”) – $15 per printer
    * Large Floor-standing Copiers and printers – $65 Per item
    * Industrial Print Centers (Much Larger than regular office copier)- minimum $200 per unit
    * Alkaline Household batteries (AA, AAA, C, D, 9V and similar) – determined by amount
    * Swollen (DDR) Li-ION & NI-MH batteries  – determined by amount.
**Disposal Fees _might_ apply based on the volume of the load or other factors:**
  *     * Toner and Ink Cartridges. Note, for some new, genuine toner cartridges, there may be no charge, and we might even offer a reimbursement. Contact us with the specific models for more details.
    * Miscellaneous Consumer Electronics _if in large qty_ (ie: CD Players, VCRs, toys, remotes)
    * Security Devices (ie: cameras, alarm systems, and similar)
    * Large Electronics and equipment (ie: Medical Equipment, Empty server Racks)- send pictures for quote
**Items that are not accepted:**
  *     * Appliances (ie: regular size Refrigerators, Washing Machines, dishwashers) – can be dropped off at your local appliance recycling place, or **Transfer Stations**
    * Light Bulbs (You can drop them off at Local Home Depot, Batteries Plus Bulbs, or **Hazardous Waste Stations near you****.** Contact them for more info).
    * Electric items, such as receptacles, motors, light fixtures, kitchen appliances, vacuums, and similar items, that have no hazardous electronic circuit boards in them. The best place to take it to is any metal (non-ferrous) recycling place. You might even get money for that.
    * Metal, Plastic, and other non-electronic items.
Please note, businesses MAY qualify for free pick up, depending on load size, type, and location of the load (please call to inquire).
**E-Waste Drop-offs Schedule:**
Monday – Wednesday (9:00 am –5:00 pm) ONLY.
